Package bto.Controller

Class OfficerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • bto.Controller.OfficerController
  • public class OfficerController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing officer-related operations, such as project registration, application management, and enquiry handling.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  OfficerController.RegistrationStatus
      Represents the registration status of an officer for a project.

      • OfficerController

        public OfficerController​(Officer officer,
                         ApplicationDao applicationDao,
                         ProjectDao projectDao,
                         EnquiryDao enquiryDao)
        Constructs an OfficerController with the specified dependencies.
        Parameters:
        officer - The officer associated with this controller.
        applicationDao - The DAO for managing applications.
        projectDao - The DAO for managing projects.
        enquiryDao - The DAO for managing enquiries.

    • Method Detail

      • registerProject

        public void registerProject​(java.lang.String projectName)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Registers the officer for a project.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the project to register for.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the registration fails due to validation issues.

      • viewRegistrationStatus

        public java.util.List<OfficerController.RegistrationStatus> viewRegistrationStatus()
        Views the registration status of the officer for all projects.
        Returns:
        A list of registration statuses for the officer.

      • generateReceipt

        public java.lang.String generateReceipt​(java.lang.String applicationId)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates a receipt for a booked application.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The ID of the application.
        Returns:
        A string containing the receipt details.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the application is not found or is not booked.

      • viewApplicationsForMyProjects

        public java.util.List<Application> viewApplicationsForMyProjects()
                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves all applications for projects assigned to the officer.
        Returns:
        A list of applications for the officer's projects.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the officer is not assigned to any projects.

      • updateStatus

        public void updateStatus​(java.lang.String applicationId)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Updates the status of an application to "booked".
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The ID of the application to update.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the application cannot be updated.

      • viewEnquiriesForMyProjects

        public java.util.List<Enquiry> viewEnquiriesForMyProjects()
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves all enquiries for projects assigned to the officer.
        Returns:
        A list of enquiries for the officer's projects.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If no projects are assigned to the officer.

      • replyEnquiry

        public void replyEnquiry​(int enquiryId,
                         java.lang.String reply)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Replies to an enquiry for a project assigned to the officer.
        Parameters:
        enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to reply to.
        reply - The reply message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the reply cannot be processed.

      • getAllProjects

        public java.util.List<Project> getAllProjects()
        Retrieves all projects.
        Returns:
        A list of all projects.
